== find ==
ref:http://blog.miniasp.com/post/2010/08/27/Linux-find-command-tips-and-notice.aspx

find $HOME -name "*.pdf"

find / -size +1024c

find / -size -1024c

find / -size +1024c -and -size -10240c

寻找大于特定文件大小的文件

find . -type f -size + 100000k

- -mount 不跨越文件的挂载点进行查找,在某些情况下,例如不希望检查挂载路径时非常方便

== tree ==

tree -f | grep ABC

== locate ==

locate ABC
